oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - R & B For You And Me - 2004-03-27
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance and interviews with the Nick Nixon band from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March, 27, 2004. In support of the exhibit "Night Train to Nashville: Music City Rhythm and Blues".
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Nick Nixon; Billy Cox; Jimmy Otey; Jeremy Nixon; Waldo Weathers; Wayne Hill;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Moderated by Justine Gregory. Includes questions from the audience. Opening comments. Introduction of the band. Stand By Me (Nick Nixon) -- Run down of band members history -- Interview with drummer Jimmy Otey -- Mustang Sally (Nick Nixon) -- Interview with saxophonist Waldo Weathers -- People Get Ready (Nick Nixon) -- Interview with bass player Billy Cox -- Respect Yourself (Nick Nixon) -- Interview with trumpeter Wayne Hill (off mic) -- I Can't Stop Loving You (Nick Nixon) -- Introduction of keyboardist Jeremy Nixon (off mic) -- Every Day I Have The Blues (Nick Nixon) -- Interview with Nick Nixon -- Closing comments.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gregory, Justine; Nixon, Nick; Cox, Billy; Otey, James; Nixon, Jeremy; Weathers, Waldo; Hill, Wayne; Country Music Foundation;
